65  enum Language {
66  XQUERY = 0x00,
67  XPATH2 = 0x01,
68  FULLTEXT = 0x02,
69  UPDATE = 0x04,
70  EXTENSIONS = 0x08,
71  XSLT2 = 0x10,
72  VERSION3 = 0x20,
73

75  XQUERY_UPDATE = (XQUERY | UPDATE),
76  XQUERY_FULLTEXT_UPDATE = (XQUERY | FULLTEXT | UPDATE),
